Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the Filmfare Awards and Dharma Productions?
Options:
A. a) Dharma Productions was recognized for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards.
B. b) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on March 27, 2021.
C. c) The Best Film category is a prestigious recognition in the Indian film industry.
D. d) Dharma Productions has never been involved in the Filmfare Awards.
Correct Answer:
a) Dharma Productions was recognized for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards. 
b) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on March 27, 2021. 
c) The Best Film category is a prestigious recognition in the Indian film industry.

Question & Options:
Which entities were recognized at the Filmfare Awards for their contributions in the Best Film category?
Options:
A. Dharma Productions
B. Zee Studios
C. Best Film award
D. Filmfare Awards
